title: APICollection
description: This schema defines the APICollection entity. API Collection allows user to group multiple APIs together. In OpenAPI specification its marked as a Tag.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies a API Collection instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this API Collection.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this API Collection. It could be title or label from the source services.

fullyQualifiedName.description: A unique name that identifies a API Collection in the format 'ServiceName.ApiCollectionName'.

description.description: Description of the API Collection, what it is, and how to use it.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

endpointURL.title: Endpoint URL
endpointURL.description: EndPoint URL for the API Collection. Capture the Root URL of the collection.

apiEndpoints.description: All the APIs included in this API Collection.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

service.description: Link to service where this API Collection is hosted in.

serviceType.description: Service type where this API Collection is hosted in.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.

domains.description: Domains the API Collection belongs to. When not set, the API Collection inherits the domain from the API service it belongs to.

dataProducts.description: List of data products this entity is part of.

lifeCycle.description: Life Cycle properties of the entity
